description:
After a long day on the trail, refuel with this rich and cheesy meal.

  • Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add
  • Ingredients: precooked rice, cheddar cheese powder (cheddar cheese [milk, salt, bacterial cultures, enzymes], disodium phosphate,*may contain sodium aluminum silicate), broccoli florets, parmesan cheese powder (parmesan cheese [partially skimmed milk, bacterial cultures, salt, enzymes], disodium phosphate), carrots, modified milk ingredients, dehydrated potatoes, butter powder (butter, skim milk powder, sodium caseinate, sodium phosphate), milk ingredients, onion, celery, onion, dried garlic, natural flavour, seasoning (yeast extract, salt, canola oil), sea salt, spinach, thyme
  • Allergens - contains: milk
  • No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy
  • Meals have a 5-year shelf life
name: AlpineAire Creamy Broccoli Cheddar Rice
